oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter of William House to his sister
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from William House, Co. B and Co. F, 12th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, who served at Shiloh and at the Battle of Belmont, to his sister. House mentions his brother's regiment moving over close to his. He discusses the Battle of Shiloh and states that "we retired from the field and took up our line of march for Corinth." He also reveals: "We know but little as to the result of the battle the last day.
